quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: It is good thing for an uneducated man to read book of quotations.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: There are terrible lot of lies going about the world, and the worst of it is half of them are true.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: To build may have to bo slow and laborious task of years. To destroy can be a thoughtless act of a single day.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: To improve is to change. So to be perfect is to change often.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: The farther backward you look, the farther forward you are likely to see.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: The price of greatness is responsibillity.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: Men occasionally stumble over the truth. but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as nothing has ever happened.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: Never hold a diccusions with the monkey when the organ grinder is in the room.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: One ought never to turn one's back on a threatened danger and try to run away from it. If you do that, you will double the danger. But if you meet it promptly and without flinching, you will reduce the danger by half.
quotes.details: ought (auxiliary) -> should, flinching -> be shocked, be frightened

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: Personally, I'm ready to learn, although I do not always like being tought.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: Success is the abillity to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal, it is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: If you are going to hell, keep going.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: You have an enemies? good! It's mean you have stood up for something. sometime in your life.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: It is not enough that we do our best. Sometimes we have to do what is required.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: When the eagles are silent. The parrots begin to jabber.
quotes.details: jabber -> nonsense talk, talk rapidly and excitedly with little sense.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: I greatest lesson in life is to know that even fools are right sometimes.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: I like pigs. Dogs look up on us. cats look down on us, but pigs treat us as equals.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: Out of intense complexities, intense simplicities emerge.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: In finance, everything that is agreeable is unsound and everything that is sound is disagreeable.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: Everyone has his day. Some days last longer than others.

quotes.author: winston churchill
quotes.quote: We shape our dwellings. And afterward our dwellings shape us
